name: HorizonX
description: HorizonX is an AI-powered integrated research environment that streamlines the entire research workflow from brainstorming to publication.
longDescription: HorizonX is a comprehensive platform designed to revolutionize research by integrating AI-driven tools for every stage of the research process. Its mission is to empower innovators and accelerate innovation by providing a unified, intelligent workspace that eliminates the need for multiple disjointed tools. The platform serves users by offering seamless collaboration, automated assistance, and high-performance computing, helping researchers save time and enhance productivity. It addresses common challenges in research, such as inefficient literature reviews, complex data analysis, and tedious formatting, through context-aware AI features. Tailored for students, individual researchers, and institutions, HorizonX offers scalable plans to accommodate varying needs and budgets.
features: AI-Powered Brainstorming Engine generates ideas and facilitates collaboration to kickstart research projects efficiently.
Context-Aware Literature Engine accelerates literature reviews by understanding research context and suggesting relevant papers.
Low-Code Data Analysis transforms raw data into publication-ready charts without requiring extensive coding skills.
Real-Time Collaboration enables team-based editing similar to Google Docs but optimized for research-grade workflows.
Unified Knowledge Nexus provides a single workspace to connect ideas, insights, and all research tools seamlessly.
Automated Citation Manager intelligently handles reference management to ensure accuracy and compliance.
Smart Formatting Assistant automates journal-specific formatting for effortless submission preparation.
Pre-Publication Quality Check acts as a 24/7 AI peer reviewer to improve manuscript quality before submission.
On-Demand HPC Access delivers high-performance computing resources without the hassle of setup or maintenance.

faqs.question: What is HorizonX?
faqs.answer: HorizonX is an AI-powered integrated research environment that combines brainstorming, literature review, data analysis, AI-assisted writing, citation management, and peer review into one secure platform.

faqs.question: Does HorizonX offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Explorer plan is free and includes basic AI brainstorming, literature review, limited AI-assisted writing, citation management, and access to over 250 million papers.

faqs.question: Who is HorizonX designed for?
faqs.answer: HorizonX is designed for students, individual researchers, and institutions looking to streamline their research workflows with AI tools and collaboration features.

faqs.question: What AI features does HorizonX provide?
faqs.answer: HorizonX offers AI-powered brainstorming, context-aware literature reviews, AI-assisted writing, smart formatting, AI peer review, and advanced AI models in higher-tier plans.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with others on HorizonX?
faqs.answer: Yes, HorizonX supports real-time collaboration for up to 10 users in the Researcher plan, allowing seamless team-based research and editing.

faqs.question: How does HorizonX handle data analysis?
faqs.answer: HorizonX provides low-code/no-code tools to analyze data and create publication-ready visuals, with on-demand HPC access for complex computations.

faqs.question: Is HorizonX secure for research data?
faqs.answer: Yes, HorizonX ensures enterprise-grade security, especially in the Institution plan, to protect sensitive research data and intellectual property.

faqs.question: What support options are available?
faqs.answer: Free plans include community support, while paid plans offer priority support, and institutions get onboarding, training, and a central admin dashboard.

faqs.question: Can I access high-performance computing on HorizonX?
faqs.answer: Yes, on-demand HPC access is available in paid plans, providing computing resources without setup, with credit-based usage in the Researcher plan.

faqs.question: How does HorizonX assist with publications?
faqs.answer: HorizonX offers automated citation management, smart formatting for journal compliance, and pre-publication AI quality checks to prepare manuscripts efficiently.
